cause.description:
Public Campaign Action Fund is a national nonpartisan organization with more than 150,000 members working to advance comprehensive public financing of elections. PCAF also holds elected officials accountable for doing special favors for political backers.
1. Elections should be about voters and not big campaign donors
2. Everyone should be able to participate equally in the electoral process
cause.mission: pass comprehensive public financing of elections
cause.name: Fair and Clean Elections Now
